article_node.title: Trump's Tariffs Lead To Celebrations For Indian Consumers
article_node.summary: India’s government announced a broad consumption tax cut to offset the impact of U.S. tariffs, boosting consumer spending and lifting Indian equities, especially staples and auto stocks. The cuts are expected to provide a net positive effect on consumption, though fiscal concerns remain about increased borrowing to cover revenue losses. Market participants see the reform as a short‑term boost, while long‑term effects on fiscal balance and credit ratings are still uncertain.
